snippet.title: Epic Adventures: La Jangada
snippet.description:
Epic Adventures: La Jangada for PC: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/7310/epic-adventures-la-jangada/index.html

Help Minha save her father from the gallows in this 19th century epic based on Jules Vernes novel La Jangada. Find evidence spread around the Jangada, search for clues to unravel the mystery of Joam Dacosta's past and solve intriuging puzzles as you travel through the great Amazon.

  * Immersive atmosphere
  * Uncover the truth
  * Help Minha save her father!
  * Check out our complete game walkthrough at http://www.bigfishgames.com/blog/epic-adventures-la-jangada-walkthrough/
